title: HIMBHOOMI
desc: The core software developed by NIC for digitizing HP Land Records (Jamabandi). Allows online mutation entry and ROR generation.

title: mHimBhoomi
desc: Android app for citizens to view Jamabandi (RoR) and Mutation status on mobile. Search by Khewat, Khatoni, or Khasra number.

title: SVAMITVA Scheme
desc: Central scheme using Drones to survey 'Abadi Deh' (Habitation) areas. Goal: To issue Property Cards (Sampatti Card) to villagers for housing.

title: PM-KISAN
desc: â‚¹6,000/year income support. Patwari verifies land ownership and 'Land Seeding' status (beneficiary must be a cultivator).

title: e-Praman / Lok Praman
desc: Portal for issuing Himachali Bonafide, Caste, Income, and Legal Heir certificates based on Patwari/Pradhan verification.

title: ULPIN
desc: Unique Land Parcel Identification Number. A 14-digit 'Aadhaar for Land' containing geo-coordinates of the plot.

title: RCMS
desc: Revenue Court Case Monitoring System. Online portal to track status of partitions, appeals, and mutations in revenue courts.

title: HIMRIS / NGDRS
desc: Himachal Registration Information System (now migrating to NGDRS). Used by Sub-Registrars for registering Sale/Mortgage Deeds.

title: Bhu-Naksha
desc: Software for digitizing cadastral maps (Musavis). Allows viewing plot maps online integrated with ROR data.

title: Sugam Centers
desc: Single Window Centers at DC/SDM offices where citizens can get Nakal (copies) of Jamabandi and other revenue documents.

title: e-District
desc: The overarching state portal integrating revenue services like land record copies and certificate issuance.
